products.name: Hand-painted Madhubani Saree
products.description: A beautiful Tussar silk saree, hand-painted with traditional Madhubani motifs depicting tales of nature and mythology.

products.name: Terracotta Horse Statue
products.description: A rustic terracotta horse, symbolizing power and grace, handcrafted by artisans from Panchmura village.

products.name: Warli Art Coasters (Set of 4)
products.description: Set of four wooden coasters, hand-painted with intricate Warli art, perfect for adding a touch of ethnic charm to your home.

products.name: Pashmina Shawl with Sozni Embroidery
products.description: An exquisite Pashmina shawl from Kashmir featuring delicate Sozni hand-embroidery. A timeless piece of wearable art.

profile.name: Ravi Kumar
profile.story: I am a third-generation block-printer from Jaipur, keeping the traditions of my family alive through vibrant textiles...
profile.heritage: Sanganeri block-printing is a traditional art form from Rajasthan, known for its delicate floral patterns and use of natural dyes.
